content.label: Simple, fun, and pretty. I wasn’t trying to learn, so I’m not sure how good it is for learning. Otherwise I really like it

THIS IS SO CUTE IDXJBXKSUCGC i found it on tiktok and 100000000% recommend it! I love the little character and how he sings the note 🥺🥺🥺❤️❤️❤️
I just wanted to say thank you so much for making this app. Its very easy to figure out, and i really appreciate that there arent any ads. Once again, thank you so so much!

It’s such a nice way to learn kalimba without having to buy a real one, it’s also good for practice. The graphs is are amazing and very adorable, I love how you’re able to adjust it to your personal preference. Overall this is such a nice app.
I absolutely love this app for anyone who does not have a Kalimba the sounds are beautiful there are NO ads at all and you can choose your markings and etc. U^U
i saw this app and had to try it. the sounds quality is really amazing and it’s a super simple interface! i would definitely recommend.
Hello I love this app it’s taught me a lot it may seem stupid but it has but I have a big concern the app isn’t working no matter what I do the sound simply won’t come out
It is very cute, verrry well made, not to mention the fact that it is COMPLETELY FREE, AND NO ADS!!! 1000000/10 (sounds like a real kalimba too!)
I don't have a kalimba yet, but its on the way, and i find this app really helpful for learning the keys and such 🥺❤️

title.label: I LOVE THIS APP SO MUCH!

content.label: This app is amazing! I 10/10 recommend getting it!!! The sound is so clean. The design is cute and it’s very simple and easy to customize. You can change the key, you can change the background color, you can change the key labels, you can really customize everything! It’s soooo great!
Love the interface so much. Easy to play!
I LOVED the sound, mmm amazing! really recommend downloading this app! Just saw a scorpion and this calms me down! Great for car trips! But not when your sister says shut up..

title.label: Great app! But I have one question

content.label: This app is amazing, it helps me when tuning my Kalimba. But I have one question, is there a 17 key setting. Because I have a 17 key Kalimba and a 13 key which is what I use for this app. I would love a response incase you could make a update with that or if there already is that setting, Thank you!

Hey i just got this app. Its honestly so cute and the sound is clean. You can change the background too so it can fit your mood. I bought a real Kalimba and it gets here tomorrow. I am using this to get the feel for it and maybe learn a little tune. Thanks for making this entertaining and useful app.

This is a fantastic sounding instrument.  Whomever did the samples crafted them with love and care and it just sounds beautiful. 

It’s also very accessible and easy to hand any beginner and give them instant gratification of playing an instrument. 

The frustrating part is it lacks a couple of features that would let it be usable by a lot more musicians. I’m sure this app would be used professionally (or more often) if it had auv3  support. If not that simple midi input controls could be a quick workaround.

Also it should be easier to play sharps and flats or the entire scale. I get it that doing so may not match the spirit of the original instrument, but letting it be played with some kind of keyboard while maintaining that great sound would really be cool.

title.label: Pro tip: Switch your phone off silent

content.label: I was going insane because I couldn’t hear the music I was supposedly creating, but 100% user error — I just had to physically switch my phone off silent! This app is beautifully designed and I am looking forward to playing around and maybe actually learning a song. It’s already helped with my anxiety and fidgeting. My only suggestion would be to make it rotate so I could play it while holding the phone naturally, instead of landscape only.

title.label: Super cute and beautiful sound quality

content.label: It would be great to have the option to display the key letters in settings... I kinda go by the letters on my Kalimba so switching because the actual instrument and the app is kinda hard :/ still an amazing app though! (Edit: thank you dev there is a way the app is perfect 😌✋🏼)
but is it possible to have 21 keys ? 🥺
I really enjoy this app. :) It’s very simple, and I love the fact that it has no ads.
This app is very well made very professional and easy to use!

The graphics of this app are beautiful! I love the sound quality as well as the visual customization settings!! I have a couple suggestions though, the app doesn’t seem to work without headphones and I think it would be great if it could!! The other thing, maybe give it a setting or a space where you can have multiple tracks that you recorded?
Great app though, not planning on deleting it any time soon!

I don't usually write review but this app is too kyoot omg omg >.<
best kalimba app I've seen so far. Please keep up the good work

I love this app so much!! the ui is so cute and the little smiley is such a wonderful touch. the sound quality is also really good.

suggestion: maybe in the future update (hopefully), we can tune individual keys? i can’t quite get my show yourself cover right in one go. but this is just a convenience thing! 💗
Fun and very easy to use and play around with!
this is absolutely adorable and I love it!! I especially love the ability to record loops to play over. the ability to tune it as well is really nice! 12/10 would recommend
Simple and fun to use. Does one job and does it extremely well.
